cards.name: Umber Loyalist
cards.text: Reaction: After Umber Loyalist enters play, draw 2 cards. Forced Interrupt: When Umber Loyalist leaves play, choose and discard 2 cards from your hand.

cards.name: White Harbor
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. The losing opponent adds 1 of those cards to your hand. Place the other on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Lazy Leo
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Lazy Leo comes out of shadows, choose a player. Shuffle any number of events from that player's discard pile into his or her deck.

cards.name: Growing Ambition
cards.text: Shadow (X). Challenges Action: Search your deck for X different cards and place them in your discard pile. Shuffle your deck. Then, choose an opponent. Return X cards of that opponent's choice from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Naive Scout
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. While there is a card in shadows, Naive Scout cannot be declared as a defender.

cards.name: Miner's Pick
cards.text: Builder or Steward character only. Attached character gets +1 STR. +1 Income.

cards.name: Valyrian's Crew
cards.text: Stealth. You may marshal or play facedown cards attached to Valyrian's Crew as if they were in your hand. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Valyrian's Crew is attacking, attach the top card of the losing opponent's deck to Valyrian's Crew facedown under your control, as an attachment with terminal.

cards.name: Blackwater Bay
cards.text: Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, kneel Blackwater Bay to choose an opponent. Draw 1 card for each kneeling character that player controls.

cards.name: Catspaw
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Catspaw comes out of shadows, pay X gold to choose a character with printed cost X or lower and return it to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Gold Mine
cards.text: Action: Kneel Gold Mine and discard 1 card from your hand to draw 1 card. +1 Income.

cards.name: Drowned God Fanatic
cards.text: Action: Kill a character to put Drowned God Fanatic into play from your dead pile. (Max once per round.) Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's triggered character ability would initiate, place Drowned God Fanatic into your dead pile from your hand to cancel those effects.

cards.name: Dragonbinder
cards.text: Character you control only. Attached character gains intimidate. Reaction: After you win dominance, kill attached character to, either: choose and take control of a Dragon character, or search the top 10 cards of your deck for a [greyjoy] character, put into play, and shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Hired Assassin
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Hired Assassin comes out of shadows, look at a card in shadows. If it is a character, you may place it in its owner's dead pile.

cards.name: Queensguard
cards.text: Non-Lady character only. Shadow (2). Action: Discard 1 card from your hand to stand attached character. (Limit 3 times per round.)

cards.name: Ser Archibald Yronwood
cards.text: Shadow (4). No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After you lose dominance, the winning opponent must choose and kill a character he or she controls.

cards.name: Summer Sea Port
cards.text: +1 Income.+1 Reserve.

cards.name: Poor Fellows
cards.text: No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Poor Fellows is attacking, the losing opponent chooses, either: Poor Fellows gains 1 power, or you draw 1 card.

cards.name: King's Landing
cards.text: Once per marshaling phase, you may marshal a location from your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Challenges Action: Kneel King's Landing and discard 1 location from your hand to draw 1 card.

cards.name: Glass Candle
cards.text: Character you control only. If attached character has the Maester trait, it gains insight. Challenges Action: Kneel Glass Candle to look at the top card of any player's deck. You may discard that card.

cards.name: Uneasy Truce
cards.text: Each player cannot gain power for his or her faction except during challenges. Forced Reaction: After a challenge is initiated, move 1 power from the attacking player's faction card to the defending player's faction card.
